casebody.data:
2001-3261 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE ex rel. Patrick BOLIAN v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3261. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Bolian, Patrick; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. G, Nos. 203061, 215497, 279748; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 KW 2048.

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.3; State ex rel. Melinie v. State, 93-1380 (La. 1/12/96), 665 So.2d 1172.

WEIMER, J., recused.
